full_summary:
# Hamilton Ontario Randle Reef Stage 3 ECF Cap Construction
## EC Federation Contract Construction
### Information Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) requires a qualified General Contractor to provide the Proposed Work in the Randle Reef Stage 3 project, which involves the construction of an engineered multi-layer cap on top of the Environmental Containment Facility (ECF) in Hamilton, Ontario.

#### Project Details
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contract Reference Number:** WS3873888363
- **Contractor Number:** 3873920921
- **Solicitation Number:** WS3873888363
- **Publication Date:** February 16, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2023 @ 14:00:00 (2:00 PM EDT)
- **Amendment Date:** March 9, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 14, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** December 31st, 2024

#### Project Scope
The Randle Reef Stage 3 project consists of constructing an engineered multi-layer cap on top of the ECF in Hamilton, Ontario.

#### Bidder Eligibility
Bidders are expected to meet all the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this contract are based on the "Lowest Price" method.

#### Language
English, French

#### Location
- **Region of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding NCR), Canada, Hamilton
- **Contact Information**
- Sheila (She/Her), PSPC
- Tel: Not Available
- Email: [sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Visit: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15443067?extsite=MTU0NDMwNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== for more information about this project.
---
